mapper.select: SELECT account account, password password, salt salt, name name FROM tb_manager

SELECT DISTINCT c.url url, c.code code, c.name name, c.icon icon FROM tb_manager_role a left JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.role_id = b.role_num left JOIN tb_menu c ON c.code = b.menu_code WHERE c.is_menu = 0 AND a.manager_id = #{managerId}
SELECT USER_NAME employeeName, HEAD_IMG_URL url FROM tb_user_info WHERE WORK_NO = #{employeeCode}
